text: Spendco!
Whoa.

Man: Samples.
Get your samples.

- It's massive.
- Beautiful.

- They got avocados here?
- They've got everything here.
Come on, Frobo. Shopping spree!
Which way to the avocados?

Toys! Toys!
Where are the toys?

- Both: Whoo!
- No hopping.

- Sprig: Sorry!
- Oh!

We meet again,
Anne Boonchuy.

The only way to save
your father is to defeat me.
Ugh, Dad, I'm too old for this.

- Aw, really?
- Nope!
Aah! Ugh!
Hey, go easy on your old man.
Whoa. Sorry!

- Gotcha.
- Aah!

I was your mother
the whole time.

These parents are
the worst.

Man: Hey, you can't play
with those.

- Everybody scatter!
- Aah!
Come back here!
( kiais )
If you have a saber display,

you're going to get
a Boonchuy battle.

- That's just the way it goes.
- Dang right.
Hey, are you all right?

Yeah, totally.
I got to go find Sprig.

Anne, check this thing out.
Booyah!

- Hm?
- Uh, are you okay?

What? Oh, yeah.
It didn't hit me.
But are you okay in here?
( sighs ) Not really.

I've been so focused
on opening the portal

and getting back to Amphibia,
I haven't thought about

what I'll be leaving
on this side-- my parents.

I get it.
They're pretty great.

What if we wait
a couple days?

You can spend more time
with your parents.

I'm sure Amphibia can wait
a little while longer.

Hm. I suppose
that could be a good idea.
Hop Pop: Gangway!
Holy, guacamole!
Hey, kids.

Hop Pop?
What is all this stuff?

Avocado hummus. Avocado oil.
Avocado face masks.
There's avocado everything!

When I share it all
with Amphibia,
we'll be set for life!

You like Frobo's new treads?
We stopped by the RC car aisle.

- What's with the DVDs?
- Oh, nothing much.

Just my favorite
"Die Difficultly" films.

Bryce Wallace
is an action movie genius.

I don't think this movie
is age appropriate.

Anyway, see you nerds later.
We're going to go check out.

Mr. Boonchuy has, like,
eight credit cards.
( both laughing )

Hey, have you guys
seen my wallet?

All right.
That's the last of it.

See? I told you
it would all fit.

- Right guys?
- ( chiptune music playing )
Snug as a bug, Mr. Boonchuy.

Stack more on me!
I can take it.

I knew there was a reason
I married you.
( sirens wailing )
Hup-hup-hup-hup-hup-hup!

Looks like we've caught you
at last, my little froggies.
Heh-heh, frogs? What frogs?
( croaks )
Quick, you guys! Run!

- Anne! Oh, no!
- Get up, girl!
Aah!

Anne? So we finally
have a name?

I got to say, kid,
you've caused me

a lot of grief,
but that's all over now.
Pack it up, boys.

What about the girl
and her parents?

Leave them.
There's nothing they can do now.

- Hey! What the--
- ( overlapping shouting )
Guys, no!
All: Anne!
